explains: n. 连续，持续；延续物，附加物；（停顿后的）继续，再开始

sentences.en: This chapter is a continuation of Chapter 8.
He predicts a continuation of healthy profits in the current financial year.
sentences.cn: 他预测本财政年度能继续保持可观的利润。

sentences.en: This lesson is a continuation of our last lesson.
sentences.cn: 这课是上一课的延续部分。
